page.title: 09Whitbourne Hall(Brockhampton
page.content: Whitbourne Hall a Victorian Mansion (1862).It belongs to the family who ran a successful vinegar factory. They now live in a house by the lake .Bill,their son,now owns the building. All the rooms are now being sold to make into flats.Bill's bedroom is now a 7 roomed house up stairs and down. My Uncle Dave bought two rooms which he has made in to flats.There are lovely gardens and a maze and a orangery but there is no glass in in it at present.There are four rooms that are still used in there proper way.There is a ball room with a chandelier.A dining room with a huge table and a study with loads of books. There is a lovely marble staire case. There are lots of animal skins with the heads.Round the the front there are some beautiful pillars.
